metadata.title: CVE-2024-40673 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In Source of ZipFile.java, there is a possible way for an attacker toexecute arbitrary code by manipulating Dynamic Code Loading due to improperinput validation. This could lead to remote code execution with noadditional execution privileges needed. User interaction is not needed forexploitation.

criterions.comment: android-platform-libcore package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
